title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 2015 Kialara Ruby Labyrinth #12 of 20*Comes with original numbered sleeve and a Kialara protective plastic caseMore information: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3219883STARTING BID: 0.250BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: APRIL 23rd, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: bitdaryl on April 17, 2023, 03:09:05 PMLoaded? No, not loaded

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on April 19, 2023, 01:12:46 PMAny interest?Only 20 of these made!!! Yeah, but that starting bid kills me when I think back in time lol...

comments.author: stillherehodling
comments.created_time: April 20, 2023, 05:49:02 AMLast edit: April 20, 2023, 07:03:29 AM by stillherehodling
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on April 20, 2023, 12:15:25 AMQuote from: minerjones on April 19, 2023, 01:12:46 PMAny interest?Only 20 of these made!!! Yeah, but that starting bid kills me when I think back in time lol...  I have a faint memory of TMAN being one of a few peeps to secure a number of these.....and put up for resale on here, for around $3000, at that time. Edit: ......or was it 'To the Moon'. Sorry, ole bastards memory at work, here!

comments.author: M-BTC
comments.body: Starting bid seems very fair. I owned one of these and sold it in early 2019 for $8,600 (~0.30 BTC at the current rate).

comments.author: bitdaryl
comments.body: I'd love to have a Labyrinth but can't afford this version. Such an amazing piece!
